title: Hackathon 2025: Building Smart Solutions
description: A two-day hackathon where students form teams to solve real-world problems such as traffic management, health tech, and financial inclusion. Alumni mentors from Pathao, Grameenphone, and UNDP will guide participants. The winning team will receive internship opportunities and prizes worth 10,000 BDT.

title: Full Stack MERN Career Meetup
description: A MERN-focused meetup with recruiters and MERN developers discussing hiring strategies and portfolio building.

title: Cybersecurity Hands-on Workshop
description: Learn ethical hacking, web security, Kali Linux, and practical penetration testing with live demonstrations.

title: Machine Learning for Beginners
description: Beginner-friendly introduction to ML, including supervised learning, model evaluation, and Python ML projects.

title: AI in 2025: Career Path & Opportunities
description: A detailed session on AI careers: LLM Engineering, MLOps, Prompt Engineering, and high-paying AI job roles.
